content:
There are budget-friendly accommodation options located near the Opera House and Harbour Bridge. Here are a few suggestions:

1. The Big Hostel: This budget-friendly hostel is located in Chippendale, just a 15 minute drive from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge. 2. Ibis Styles Sydney East: This budget hotel is located in Kings Cross, just over a mile from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge. 3. YHA Sydney Harbour: This hostel is located in The Rocks, just a 10 minute walk from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge. 4. Travelodge Hotel Sydney Wynyard: This budget hotel is located in Wynyard, just half a mile from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge. 5. The Capsule Hotel: This budget guesthouse is located in Darlinghurst, just over a mile from the Opera House and Harbour Bridge. These accommodation options offer easy access to the iconic landmarks of Sydney, making your trip more convenient and enjoyable.
